update good set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, des = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_type_id = #{goodTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ratio = #{ratio,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ratio_price = #{ratioPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scope_id = #{scopeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pet_category_id = #{petCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bathing_service_id = #{bathingServiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select , (select name from category c where c.id=g.category_id ) categoryName, p.id coupon_id,p.coupon_name,p.type from good g left join coupon p on g.shop_id = p.shop_id left join favourite_good fg on g.id = fg.good_id where g.status = 1 and p.status=0 and fs.status = 1 and fs.user_id = #{userId} order by g.create_time desc
mapper.update: update good set status=#{status} where id = #{goodId}
update good set discount=#{discount} where goods_type_id = #{goodsTypeId} and shop_id = #{shopId}
mapper.select:
select
from good where status = 1 order by id asc
